title: The Savage Guns - aka Tierra brutal (1962 - USA) western
description:
The Savage Guns (1962 - Spain, USA)                   original title Tierra brutal

Drama / Romance / Western

starring . . . . Richard Basehart, Paquita Rico, Don Taylor
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056448/


Filmed at AlmerÃ­a, AndalucÃ­a, Spain and Ãguilas, Murcia, Spain

The film takes place in a small valley in the Mexican state of Sonora, near the Arizona Territory, around 1870. Steve Fallon, a drifter and gun-for-hire, is severely exhausted when travelling through the barren landscape and is found by Mike Summers and his wife, Franchea. He is taken into their home and, while recovering, he learns that a local land baron, Ortega, is pressuring local ranchers to sell their land to him with the help of Danny Pose and his gang of outlaws.

This was the first western to be shot on location in Almeria, Spain, an area which would be often used in later spaghetti westerns during the next two decades.


Video: XviD, 608x256, 23.976 fps, 1861 Kbps, 01h19m37s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
